name: NEFilterProviderConfiguration
desc: Configuration parameters for a content filter.

items.name: var filterBrowsers: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates that the system applies the filter to flows of network data originated from WebKit browser objects.

items.name: var filterSockets: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates that the system applies the filter to flows of network data originated from sockets.

items.name: var filterPackets: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates that the system applies the filter to packets of network data.

items.name: var vendorConfiguration: [String : Any]?
items.desc: A dictionary of provider-specific configuration settings.

items.name: var serverAddress: String?
items.desc: The address of a server that the Filter Control Provider may contact for rules and other configuration information.

items.name: var username: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies the user.

items.name: var organization: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies the organization that administers the filter.

items.name: var passwordReference: Data?
items.desc: A persistent reference to a keychain item containing a password associated with the filter.

items.name: var identityReference: Data?
items.desc: A persistent reference to a keychain item containing a certificate and private key associated with the filter.

items.name: var filterDataProviderBundleIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The bundle identifier of the filter data provider system extension.

items.name: var filterPacketProviderBundleIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The bundle identifier of the filter packet provider system extension.
